title: Crocs Women's Mercy Work Clog | Work Shoes, Nurse Shoes, Chef Shoes
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Shoes › Mules & Clogs
description: Gemacht für Komfort bei der Arbeit. Geräumig durch Design wie der Original Classic Clog, bietet der Mercy Work Clog großzügigen Raum rund um den Fuß. Sie hat Crocs Lock-Profil für Rutschfestigkeit, einen Fersenumschmeichelnden Rückengurt und eine geschlossene Ferse.מיוצר לנוחות בעבודה. קבקב עבודה Mercy מרווח לפי עיצוב כמו הקבקב הקלאסי המקורי, מציע מקום נדיב מסביב לכף הרגל. הנעל כוללת נעל קרוקס לעמידות בפני החלקה, רצועה אחורית המחבקת עקב ועקב סגור.مصنوع من أجل الراحة أثناء العمل. فسيح من خلال التصميم مثل القبقاب الكلاسيكي الأصلي، يوفر حذاء ميرسي وورك مساحة واسعة حول القدم. يتميز بنعل كروكس لوك لمقاومة الانزلاق، وحزام خلفي يعانق الكعب وكعب مغلق.Feito para conforto no trabalho. Espaçoso por design como o clássico clog original, o tamanco Mercy Work oferece espaço generoso ao redor do pé. Possui sola Crocs Lock para resistência a escorregões, uma alça traseira que abraça o calcanhar e um salto fechado.专为工作时舒适而设计。 Mercy Work Clog 像原版经典洞洞鞋一样宽大的设计提供了宽敞的脚部空间。 它拥有 Crocs 卡骆驰 Lock 鞋底防滑、包覆鞋跟的背带和封闭式鞋跟。專為工作舒適而設計。 Mercy Work Clog 像原始經典木屐一樣寬敞的設計,四周提供寬敞的空間。 它有防滑的 Crocs Lock 胎面,一個擁抱鞋跟的背帶和一個封閉鞋跟。작업 중에도 편안하게 사용할 수 있도록 제작되었습니다. 오리지널 클래식 클로그와 같은 디자인의 넉넉한 Mercy Work 클로그는 발 전체에 넉넉한 공간을 제공합니다. 미끄럼 방지를 위한 크록스 락 트레드, 뒤꿈치를 감싸는 백스트랩, 닫힌 힐이 있습니다.Crocs, Inc. is a rapidly growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of footwear for men, women and children under the Crocs brand. title: ASICS Men's Gel-Venture 7
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Running › Trail Running
description: Take on the toughest terrain in confidence with the men's GEL-VENTURE 7 performance trail running shoe by ASICS. Featuring GEL technology and an EVA midsole, this shoe is made for athletes who love to run in the great outdoors. GEL technology in the rearfoot area of the shoe provides shock absorption where you need it most, while the ORTHOLITE sockliner provides an additional layer of cushioning underfoot. It even molds to the shape of your feet, making each run even more comfortable than the last. Extra support comes from the sturdy upper crafted from synthetic leather, while the internal heel counter gently helps your foot remain in its natural line of motion, making for a more efficient stride. Meanwhile the EVA midsole protects your feet against impact and increases rebound, giving you an energetic feeling as you clock up the miles. Durable and practical, the GEL-VENTURE 7 shoe makes an excellent training partner whether you're new to trail running or a seasoned pro.

breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Shoes › Sandals › Platforms & Wedges
description: Effortless style, superior all-day comfort and ultimate wardrobe versatility come together in the new Crocs Brooklyn Collection. Available in a variety of heel heights and sophisticated yet simple silhouettes, each wedge features sensationally comfortable LiteRide foam technology inside — because you should never have to choose between looking and feeling your best. Crocs Brooklyn’s lightweight construction, intuitive upper straps and revolutionary comfort technology allow you to move confidently from work to play, up or downtown, without a fuss. When you can look fabulous and stay light on your feet from the day’s first step to the last, why would you settle for anything less?

title: Crocs Men's Santa Cruz Loafers
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Loafers & Slip-Ons
description: This is a slip-on loafer you’ll love for everything from casual days in the office to easygoing outings around town. Built on a Croslite material sole with canvas uppers, the Men's Santa Cruz Slip-On is lightweight and offers all of the comfort you expect from Crocs.Crocs, Inc. is a rapidly growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of footwear for men, women and children under the Crocs brand. All Crocs brand shoes feature Crocs' proprietary closed-cell resin, Croslite, which represents a substantial innovation in footwear. The Croslite material enables Crocs to produce soft, comfortable, lightweight, superior-gripping, non-marking and odor-resistant shoes. These unique elements make Crocs ideal for casual wear, as well as for professional and recreational uses such as boating, hiking, hospitality and gardening. The versatile use of the material has enabled Crocs to successfully market its products to a broad range of consumers.

title: Crocs Unisex-Child Classic Glitter Clog (Little Big Kid)
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Girls › Shoes › Clogs & Mules
description: If your little one can’t seem to get enough glitter in his or her daily routine, these glittery clogs will be the perfect accent to their outfits. A brightly colored pair of socks will only up the adorability factor and earn them compliments during school, holiday events and any family outing. Sparkle away!
